verses.name: John 13:33
verses.text: Little children, yet a little while I am with you. Ye shall seek me: and as I said unto the Jews, Whither I go, ye cannot come; so now I say to you.

verses.name: John 13:34
verses.text: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.

verses.name: John 13:35
verses.text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another.
